DOC.brief_summary: Comparison noninvasive glucose measurement performance versus standard invasive reference measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Comparison Noninvasive Blood Glucose Concentrations
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study - collect subject data near-infrared spectroscopy-based glucose meter - evaluate exist instrumentation , calibration algorithm calibration maintenance technique - collect data physiological environmental source interference degradation measurement accuracy .
DOC.criteria: Female age ≥ 18 ≤ 50 year age time enrollment Females self report diagnosis Type I , Type II Gestational Diabetes , self report diagnosis diabetes . Severe heart disease evidence peripheral edema ( self report ) Currently take Lasix ( self report ) Liver disease evidence jaundice ( self report ) Receiving dialysis know renal compromise ( self report ) Skin damage optical sampling site Scars , tattoo , rash disruption/discoloration right index finger Recent ( within past month ) current oral steroid therapy topical steroid apply hand ; inhale steroid therapy ( self report ) Current chemotherapy , chemotherapy within past 12 month ( self report )
